# offset

**Instance Property**

The byte offset of the data within the Metal buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var offset: Int { get }
```

## Metal Buffer Properties

- **buffer**: The Metal buffer backing all vertex and index data.
- **length**: The logical size of the Metal buffer, in bytes.
